name: Sex & Gun VR
description:
A new VR adult game, but not like the others :
"Grab your weapon and experience a fast paced gun fight action, interactive sex, driven by a story : "The Rise of RoboCock".

* Realistic weapon system, reload the gun with a magazine, cock the gun, count your bullets.

* Death is quick, take your time or be very fast, the reward is worth it...

* After finishing the game once, you'll be able to replay the story with the partner of your dream, choosing her Cloth, Skin, Hair, Breast, Ass, Eyes... )

* Make Love and not War ? After finishing the game, you'll have a peaceful place where you can spend time with her without being interrupted.- THE STORY -"Sex & Gun - "The Rise of Robocock"

You are a cop dragged into a case you didn't ask for - But your boss is very persuasive - Few minutes later, you head to the house where the hostage is held, the rescue won't happen without a blood bath, for sure you'll get rewarded, but at what cost ?- AND THE SEX ? -
* Here we don't have sex with robots, experience an interactive Sex : your partner looks at you, follow you with her head, react when you touch her body, interact with her cloths, physics breast, touch her hair... You can also change sex position by moving some specific point on her body - The woman genitals are textured and interactive as well.

More Image/Video & Info will be added on the website & on Steam : https://www.sexngun.com/ - You can Also join me on Discord : https://discord.gg/nkAQyyYSTAY TUNED !
